thread.title: 2017 Grammys Red Carpet Gallery: The Early Arrivals
thread.title_full: 2017 Grammys Red Carpet Gallery: The Early Arrivals

author: Lawrence Yee
title: 2017 Grammys Red Carpet Gallery: The Early Arrivals
text:
REX/Shutterstock February 12, 2017 | 03:39PM PT 
The 2017 Grammy Awards are underway, and Variety will have all the red carpet arrival photos. 
Early attendees included Lea Michele, Mya, and nominee Brandy Clark. Related 
We got a glimpse of Adele — the British songstress is dressed in green — a rare color on the red carpet. 
We’re excited to see what fashionistas Rihanna, Katy Perry, Lady Gaga, and of course, Beyonce. 
Beyonce recently revealed she and husband Jay Z are expecting twins. 
Keep coming back to see the latest arrivals from the 2017 Grammy Awards. 2017 Grammys Red Carpet Gallery: Photos of Arrivals Filed Under:
